docs.snippet: Ms. DeCrow led the National Organization for Women during the 1970s, fighting for the Equal Rights Amendment and Title IX....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. DeCrow led the National Organization for Women during the 1970s, fighting for the Equal Rights Amendment and Title IX.
docs.abstract: Karen DeCrow, who was president of the National Organization for Women during the 1970s, a turbulent period in which she helped lead campaigns for passage of the Equal Rights Amendment and against sex discrimination in education and sports, dies at age 76.

headline.main: Karen DeCrow Dies at 76; Feminist Lawyer and Author Led NOW
headline.print_headline: Karen DeCrow, Former President of NOW, Dies at 76

docs.snippet: Junior Lake hit two home runs, Emilio Bonifacio added a two-run shot and the Chicago Cubs extended their winning streak to five with a 5-2 victory over the Miami Marlins on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Junior Lake hit two home runs, Emilio Bonifacio added a two-run shot and the Chicago Cubs extended their winning streak to five with a 5-2 victory over the Miami Marlins on Saturday.

headline.main: Lake 2 HRs, Cubs Beat Marlins 5-2, Win 5th in Row

docs.snippet: Mourners came from across the city to attend funeral services for Prince Joshua Avitto, who was stabbed to death in a housing project elevator on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mourners came from across the city to attend funeral services for Prince Joshua Avitto, who was stabbed to death in a housing project elevator on Sunday.
docs.abstract: Mourners come from across New York City to attend funeral services for 6-year-old Prince Joshua Avitto, who was stabbed to death in a housing project elevator in Brooklyn; Daniel St Hubert, who has a deep criminal record and a history of psychiatric problems, has been arrested in connection with the crime.

headline.main: Hundreds Gather to Remember 6-Year-Old Victim of Brooklyn Stabbing
headline.print_headline: Hundreds Gather to Remember 6-Year-Old Victim of Brooklyn Stabbing

byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein, J. David Goodman and Marc Santora contributed reporting.
